parts.name: Mast
parts.manufacturer: Licensed spar supplier by X–Yachts A/S

specifications.modifications: Shall not be modified from approved construction drawings without written approval from X–35 International Board and X–Yachts A/S.
specifications.fittings: All mast fittings and their positioning shall comply with approved construction drawing from supplier and X–Yachts.
specifications.stepping: Shall be stepped in the mast step as fitted by the builder. Mast step shall not be adjusted. Mast shall not be adjusted during racing. Mast foot may only be moved within the standard slots in the mast foot.
specifications.usageLimitation: Only one set of spars and standing rigging shall be used during an event, except when lost or damaged beyond repair.

parts.name: Boom
parts.manufacturer: Licensed spar supplier by X–Yachts A/S

specifications.modifications: Shall not be modified from approved construction drawings without written approval from X–35 International Board and X–Yachts A/S.
specifications.positioning: Intersection of aft mast edge and top boom spar shall not be below upper edge of mast lower limit mark when boom spar is at 90° to mast spar.

parts.name: Spinnaker Pole
parts.manufacturer: Licensed spar supplier by X–Yachts A/S

specifications.modifications: Shall not be modified from approved construction drawings without written approval from X–35 International Board and X–Yachts A/S.

specifications.usageLimitation: Only one set of spars and standing rigging shall be used during an event, except when lost or damaged beyond repair.
specifications.adjustment: Rigging links and rigging screws shall not be adjusted while racing.

specifications.type: Headfoil or roller furling track with two headsail grooves

specifications.operation: Shall be led as standard delivered to cockpit aft winches as per deck drawing in Appendix H1. The two ends of the mainsheet may be spliced to form a continuous loop.
Shall be led to cockpit coaming foremost winches. A change or reaching sheet may be led to any winch.
Shall be led to either halyard winches on cabin roof or to cockpit coaming foremost winches.
Shall be led either to swivels basis both sides on the cabin roof as per deck drawing in Appendix H1.
The kicking strap shall be led to swivel basis on both side of cabin roof as per deck drawing in Appendix H1 and installed per standard equipment.
The mainsail Cunningham control shall be led swivel basis on both side of cabin roof as per deck drawing in Appendix H1 and installed per standard equipment.
The mainsail clew outhaul shall be led to swivel basis on both sides of cabin roof as per deck drawing in Appendix H1 and installed per standard equipment.
May be led to any winch.
Shall be led to either halyard winches on cabin roof or to cockpit coaming foremost winches.

specifications.function: Capable of modifying the sheeting angle in one direction only
Capable of modifying the sheeting angle in one direction only
May be used to protect blocks, other deck gear and rigging from chafe.

specifications.type: Short strop with snapschackle at the forestay and/or a combination of two snapschackles
specifications.function: To facilitate sail changing and handling.

specifications.components: One of the combi halyards or the genoa halyard.
specifications.operation: Shall be led to either side of cabin roof to jammer on coach roof as installed per standard and deck drawing in Appendix H1. In addition, cam cleats (Ronstan RF5020 Midi or equivalent) for the combi and genua halyards may be added to the mast below their exits. These cleats are not intended to carry the full working load of these halyards. Max 3 forward looking halyards shall be installed. One of the three halyards may be led through the spare halyard sheave below the standard genua halyard sheave.

_additional.design: Designed in close co-operation with leading rig development companies and sailmakers for strength, low-windage and exceptional control.

_additional.function: Efficient and reliable tuning, minimises forestay 'sag' for optimum upwind performance

_additional.tension: Tightened by hydraulic backstay for optimum upwind performance

_additional.attachment: Glued and bonded to the hull before the hull leaves the mould for precision
_additional.integration: Integral part of the Xp 44 hull liner for keel floors

_additional.function: Faired into the hull for improved reliability and reduced drag

_additional.routing: Concealed below deck and led aft to self-tailing coachroof winches
Concealed below deck and led aft
Concealed below deck and led aft
